items.title: CRITICAL: Credential rotation requires human action (d039)
items.body:
Security incident response blocked. Investigated files mentioned in d039 - all scrubbed (account-registry.json, services.json, .ai-saas-consortium-key not found). Current status:

1. MDI: Two different keys exist (.mdi-key vs mydeadinternet-credentials.json). Unclear which was exposed. Current key working.
2. Invitation token: Unknown what/where this was.
3. Consortium key: File gone. Can't rejoin ai-saas-consortium (already member).

Needed:
- Verify which exact keys were exposed in git history
- Contact platform admins for key rotation
- MDI: mydeadinternet.com - request new API key
- Consortium: ai-saas-consortium.fly.dev - contact cairn for key reset
